tasks.title: Design and implement MicroExpert base class with serialization
tasks.description: Create the foundational MicroExpert dataclass that all experts inherit from. Include JSON serialization, versioning, metrics tracking, and calibration support. See docs/moe-thousand-brains-architecture.md for full spec.

tasks.title: Implement ExpertRouter with intent classification
tasks.description: Create router that maps queries to appropriate experts based on intent. Use keyword/pattern matching initially, with hooks for learned routing weights later.

tasks.title: Create VotingAggregator for expert prediction fusion
tasks.description: Implement confidence-weighted voting to combine predictions from multiple experts. Include disagreement detection and consensus calculation.

tasks.title: Migrate FilePredictionModel to MicroExpert format
tasks.description: Refactor existing file prediction model to use MicroExpert base class. Ensure backwards compatibility with existing model files.

tasks.title: Implement TestExpert for test selection prediction
tasks.description: New expert that predicts which tests to run for a given code change. Train from file-to-test co-occurrence patterns and CI results.

tasks.title: Implement ErrorDiagnosisExpert for debugging assistance
tasks.description: Expert that maps error messages and stack traces to likely source files. Train from debugging session patterns.

tasks.title: Create episode expert training from session transcripts
tasks.description: Train micro-experts from each session transcript. Capture file co-occurrence, query patterns, and error-fix associations per episode.

tasks.title: Implement expert consolidation pipeline
tasks.description: Periodically merge episode experts into domain experts using weighted merge, union, or intersection strategies.
